"Chaotic Silence":
"Abnormal readings have been confirmed
within the old corrupted Mothership.
For some reason, captured research
subjects seem to have reawoken.
Darkers, Oceanids, Dragonkin, Natives
and Mechs have been detected.
All ARKS, deploy and investigate.
――――――――――――――――――――
Defeat enemies to earn Quest Points.
Collect [1400] Quest Points to clear."
